displayProperties.name: Operation: Seraph's Shield
displayProperties.description: Infiltrate Seraph Station in Earth's orbit to plant a virus in the Warsat network.
displayProperties.subtitle: Operation: Seraph's Shield: Standard

typeDisplayProperties.name: Exotic Mission
typeDisplayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of up to three, and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.

displayProperties.name: Temporal Disturbance
displayProperties.description: A temporal disturbance crackles with Arc energy, the same type of energy that powers the Seraph complex. A savvy Guardian could utilize this.

displayProperties.name: Reestablish Power
displayProperties.description: The complex is locked down from the inside out. Continue routing Arc power from the temporal disturbance to open a path into the Seraph complex.

displayProperties.name: Begin the Ascent
displayProperties.description: Venture deeper into the complex and ascend the Spire. Open up a route to the Pillory signal's source.

displayProperties.name: Ascend the Spire
displayProperties.description: Open a route via the grav lift to the Spire peak, where the Pillory signal is being sourced.

displayProperties.name: Ascend the Spire
displayProperties.description: Climb the Spire and reach the source of the Pillory signal.

displayProperties.name: Silence the Siren
displayProperties.description: Destroy Akelous, the Siren's Current before it can complete the Pillory protocol and imprison Rasputin's subminds.

displayProperties.name: Descend
displayProperties.description: The Sol Divisive have initiated a reactor meltdown! Descend through the Spire server stack and find a way to stop it.

displayProperties.name: Pillory Stack Containment
displayProperties.description: The meltdown is triggering lockdowns in the Spire's Pillory server stack. Initiate an override with Arc linkages to negate the lockdowns.

displayProperties.name: Prompt Critical
displayProperties.description: Destroy Persys, Primordial Ruin and prevent the complex's reactor core meltdown from causing irreparable damage.

displayProperties.name: Spire of the Watcher
displayProperties.subtitle: Spire of the Watcher: Standard
displayProperties.description: Machinations run wild in this dust-ridden ruin. Bring them to heel.

typeDisplayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of up to three, and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.

displayProperties.name: King's Fall
displayProperties.subtitle: King's Fall: Standard
displayProperties.description: Long live the King…

displayProperties.name: Open the Portal
displayProperties.description: Gain access to the Dreadnaught's inner sanctum.

displayProperties.name: Cross the Expanse
displayProperties.description: Continue traversing the Dreadnaught.

displayProperties.name: Basilica
displayProperties.description: Power the Hive glyph to lower the barrier and gain deeper access to the Dreadnaught.

displayProperties.name: Warpriest
displayProperties.description: Defeat Oryx's Warpriest before he destroys you.

displayProperties.name: Traverse the Catacombs
displayProperties.description: Find a way out of the Dreadnaught tunnels.

displayProperties.name: Golgoroth
displayProperties.description: Neutralize the Ogre to advance deeper into the Dreadnaught.

displayProperties.name: Traverse the Edge
displayProperties.description: Find Oryx, the Taken King.

displayProperties.name: The Daughters
displayProperties.description: Oryx's daughters are his last line of defense. Silence them.

displayProperties.name: Oryx
displayProperties.description: Defeat Oryx to end his threat to the solar system, and to you.

typeDisplayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of six and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.
typeDisplayProperties.name: Raid

displayProperties.name: Vow of the Disciple
displayProperties.subtitle: Vow of the Disciple: Standard
displayProperties.description: The disciple beckons…

displayProperties.name: Approach, Children…
displayProperties.description: Through mud and mire you trudge, seeking that which lies in the bog. Does it drown? Or rise? Perhaps you will decide.

displayProperties.name: You Search and Search and Search…
displayProperties.description: Listen not to those who supply cautions. It is insulting to you, oh children of Light. Let strength be your guide.

displayProperties.name: Acquisition
displayProperties.description: Your eyes are always closed. Do you not see what's right in front of you? Those who fail to see the truth will drown in it.

displayProperties.name: You Exhaust Me
displayProperties.description: Life is but a pointed game, pointing you in pointless directions towards pointless goals.

displayProperties.name: Collection
displayProperties.description: SCORN. They eat away at the decay within a shell of. SCORN. Truth exists all around outside the shell of. SCORN.

displayProperties.name: You Are Directionless…
displayProperties.description: They say purpose questioned is healthy. Perhaps aimlessness does not plague you. Futility, however…

displayProperties.name: Exhibition
displayProperties.description: Did you think you were the observer? Or did you believe you pulled the strings? Now's your chance—with artifacts of fate, you can make them dance.

displayProperties.name: Apocalypse is on Your Horizon
displayProperties.description: The end is near by your own hand, children. Come, sit beside me before you drown.

displayProperties.name: Dominion
displayProperties.description: The Upended is alive. You have no more tasks ahead. Lie down and embrace the darkness beyond your final days.

typeDisplayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of six and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.
typeDisplayProperties.name: Raid

displayProperties.description: Halt the efforts of old enemies beneath the Moon's surface.

displayProperties.subtitle: Last Wish: Normal
displayProperties.description: "The opportunity of a lifetime."

displayProperties.description: Access the Dreaming City and begin your pursuit of Riven, the last known Ahamkara.

displayProperties.description: Head higher into the Dreaming City and pursue Riven.

displayProperties.description: Defeat the corrupted Kalli to free her from Taken influence.

displayProperties.name: Find Riven
displayProperties.description: Head higher into the Dreaming City and pursue Riven.

displayProperties.name: Find Riven
displayProperties.description: Head higher into the Dreaming City and pursue Riven.

displayProperties.name: Find Riven
displayProperties.description: Head higher into the Dreaming City and pursue Riven.

displayProperties.description: Destroy Riven, the last known Ahamkara.

displayProperties.description: Escape the spire and get the Heart Stone to the Techeun.

displayProperties.name: Queenswalk
displayProperties.description: Take the Heart of Wishes to the Techeun.

typeDisplayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of six and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.
typeDisplayProperties.name: Raid

displayProperties.name: Warlord's Ruin
displayProperties.subtitle: Warlord's Ruin: Standard
displayProperties.description: Nestled deep in the mountains of the EDZ, Scorn lay claim to a Dark Age castle containing dangerous relics, and a blighted vengeance festers in the dirt.

displayProperties.name: The Climb
displayProperties.description: You've arrived at the end of a trail of Dark Ether. Press forward, climb the ridgeline path, and discover what remains hidden in stormy peaks.

displayProperties.name: Mysterious Challenger
displayProperties.description: A corrupted Knight stands between you and answers. Meet their challenge, leave them broken, but beware latent curses.

displayProperties.name: Imprisoned!
displayProperties.description: A dying wish has imprisoned you within a ruined cell. Use your wits, and find a method of escape.

displayProperties.name: Venture Deeper
displayProperties.description: The Scorn are numerous, but a whisper still calls from deeper within the castle. Press on, across the ramparts, O vengeance mine.

displayProperties.name: Buried Ruins
displayProperties.description: Navigate the ruined undercroft of the castle, and mind your footing.

displayProperties.name: Outward
displayProperties.description: Find a path outside; search for and uncover a long-defunct entrance to the main castle grounds.

displayProperties.name: Wailing Tempest
displayProperties.description: Wish for warmth, brave the frigid winds, and silence the Locus of Wailing Grief that sustains them.

displayProperties.name: Follow the Whispers
displayProperties.description: The whispers grow stronger. Their grief quelled, their vengeance almost sated. All that remains is to end the source of this corruption.

displayProperties.name: Vengeful Peak
displayProperties.description: Discover the source of the Scorn, the whispers, and cleanse the Keep of corruption.

displayProperties.name: Quell the Corruption
displayProperties.description: "You have taken my vengeance. My task is done, Naeem's wish fulfilled. Come then, slay me. Let it end." —Hefnd

typeDisplayProperties.name: Dungeon
typeDisplayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of up to three, and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.

displayProperties.name: The Shattered Throne
displayProperties.subtitle: The Shattered Throne
displayProperties.description: Strike back at the curse that plagues the Dreaming City.

displayProperties.name: Cross the Ascendant Plane
displayProperties.description: "A throne world, shattered…"

displayProperties.name: Search for safe passage
displayProperties.description: "Show me your cunning…"

displayProperties.name: Journey to the spire
displayProperties.description: "There is no place better suited for you…"

displayProperties.name: Press onward
displayProperties.description: "Her plan will never come to pass…"

displayProperties.name: Cross the chasm
displayProperties.description: "Look down. Listen to the Deep call to you…"

displayProperties.name: Vorgeth, the Boundless Hunger
displayProperties.description: "Shape your schemes into reality…"

displayProperties.name: Press onward
displayProperties.description: "Come closer…"

displayProperties.name: Ascend
displayProperties.description: "Doomed are the hesitant…"

displayProperties.name: Dûl Incaru, the Eternal Return
displayProperties.description: "Enter the infinite…"

displayProperties.description: Continue exploring the Pyramid.

displayProperties.name: Enter the Root
displayProperties.description: Reach the entrance of the root.

displayProperties.name: Scission
displayProperties.description: Overcharge the root to fuel Nezarec's return.

displayProperties.name: Cross the Chasm
displayProperties.description: Make your way across the chasm.

displayProperties.name: Macrocosm
displayProperties.description: Confront the Explicator and disrupt his influence.

displayProperties.name: Charge the Root

displayProperties.name: Return to Nezarec
displayProperties.description: Locate Nezarec at the place of his newfound power.

displayProperties.name: Defeat Nezarec
displayProperties.description: Lay Nezarec to his final rest.

displayProperties.name: Control

typeDisplayProperties.description: Hone your skills and win glory in battle against other Guardians.

displayProperties.name: Pit of Heresy
displayProperties.subtitle: Pit of Heresy: Standard
displayProperties.description: Deep beneath Sorrow's Harbor, the Hive keep their darkest secrets.

displayProperties.name: Descend into the Pit of Heresy
displayProperties.description: Delve below the Scarlet Keep and into the Pit of Heresy.

displayProperties.name: Necropolis
displayProperties.description: Turn the blades of the enemy against them.

displayProperties.name: Descend into the Pit of Heresy
displayProperties.description: Head toward the Tunnels of Despair.

displayProperties.name: Tunnels of Despair
displayProperties.description: Find a way through the Tunnels of Despair.

displayProperties.name: Chamber of Suffering
displayProperties.description: Endure the Chamber of Suffering.

displayProperties.name: Descend into the Pit of Heresy
displayProperties.description: Descend into the Harrow and survive it.

displayProperties.name: The Harrow
displayProperties.description: The way is shut by dark powers, and the Hive keep it.

displayProperties.name: Zulmak, Instrument of Torment
displayProperties.description: Slay Zulmak, Instrument of Torment.

displayProperties.name: Volmar, the Tempted
displayProperties.description: Defeat Volmar, the Tempted

typeDisplayProperties.name: Dungeon
typeDisplayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of up to three, and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.

displayProperties.name: Enter the Echo of Calus's Consciousness
displayProperties.description: "Once, I stood out overlooking a vast plain. Wildflowers and nettles blossomed at my feet. The future was full of promise and potential. Yet I upturned an overflowing chalice of shame at my feet, and let it puddle into rot."

displayProperties.name: Navigate the Mindscape
displayProperties.description: "…and here, you see, etched on the bell? That is when I attained the title of emperor and began a thousand years of peace."

displayProperties.name: Sorrow Bearer
displayProperties.description: "You were born only to suffer, because I could not set aside that which I knew was a trap. My curiosity is a poison flowing through my veins, curdling my heart, rotting my mind. And yet, I do nothing to stop it."

displayProperties.name: Dive Deeper
displayProperties.description: "Her memory curdles in my chest. Her first laugh, her first steps, her first kill. Poison. Poison. Poison."

displayProperties.name: Navigate the Crypt
displayProperties.description: "I defiled them. The remains of countless dead. Honored servants of the empire, extended members of my lineage. I ripped their tombs open to harvest their genetic information… to build an army of unquestioning soldiers. What have I become?"

displayProperties.name: Find the Way
displayProperties.description: "I should have killed every member of the old guard when I had the chance. Mercy was my greatest failing, and they used mercy's edge to cut me down to my knees."

displayProperties.name: Vault
displayProperties.description: "I beg you, don't do this."

displayProperties.name: Enter the Vault
displayProperties.description: "It hurts. It hurts. It hurts. It hurts."

displayProperties.name: Navigate the Vault
displayProperties.description: "Cut it away. A knife through memory's flesh. Peel back what I was and replace it with scalding gold. I do not want this. I do not want this. I do not want this."

displayProperties.name: Enter the Dark Shrine
displayProperties.description: "For once in my life, I do not feel shame. I feel the caress of a thousand hands, hear the comforting hush of a thousand voices. 'Do not be afraid,' it whispers. 'We are your salvation.' Yes. Please. Save me from myself."

displayProperties.name: Calus's Greatest Shame
displayProperties.directive: Defeat the Nightmare of Princess Caiatl
displayProperties.description: "Is this what I have done? Once, she looked at me with adoring eyes. I was her world, and she my stars. How have I made her into this? Have I been so blind? So selfish? What have I done?"

displayProperties.name: Duality
displayProperties.subtitle: Duality: Standard
displayProperties.description: Dive into the depths of the exiled emperor's mind in search of dark secrets.

typeDisplayProperties.name: Dungeon
typeDisplayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of up to three, and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.
